metadata.title: Lily Of The Desert - Organic Aloe Vera Gel Herbal Stomach Formula Mint - 32 oz.
description: Lily of the Desert Organic Aloeceuticals Herbal Stomach Formula Made with Maximum Strength - Aloe Vera Gel (an Herbal Dietary Supplement) and Peppermint, Chamomile, Organic Aloe Vera, Marshmallow, Linolenic Ginger, Pau D'Arco, Blessed Slippery Thistle, Elm Oatstraw, Fennel Net Wt.One Quart/946 ml.Our Soothing Stomach Formula...* *Our Soothing Digestion Herbal Formula Contains A Unique Blend Of The Finest Quality Certified Organic Whole Leaf And Fellet Aloe Vera With Select Organically Grown Herbs specifically formulated to aid in digestion.Lily of the Desert has been the leading natural food industry Certified Organic Grower.Manufacturer of processor and aloe vera juices and gel for over 28 years.Lily Aloe Vera is certified organic by teh Texas Department of Agriculture; as well as certified for "Contents and Purity" by the International Aloe Science Council. Lily Certified Organic Alo e Vera contains the maximum amount of naturally occurring aloepolysaccharides, vitamins, minerals and amino acids. Our consumers can expect the same great power exceptional quality they have received from Lily of the Desert products for years... Promotes Healthy Digestion Organically Grown Herbs and Peppermint, Chamomile, Aloe Vera, Marshmallow, Linolenic, Ginger, Pau D'Arco, Blessed Slippery thistle, elm, oatstraw, fennel with FOS (FOS fructooligosaccharides) helps promote friendly bacteria in the intestinal tract not reconstituted or watery aloepolysaccharide Rich
